data.title: Burgers.
data.text:
I went there last Sunday which was 9/11/16. It was not too busy at that time so I sat at the bar. It is a really nice place, not stuffy at all very comfortable. It looks like a place to have good fun with friends Ok, I ordered their Humboldt Burger. It was really good. Let me start as I prefer my burgers to be at least 1" thick. That is the way to produce the great beef taste, a burger that is really thin does NOT have any beef taste. I see so many other place that state that they make great burgers,but they smash the burger patties with the spatula until it is so thin and dry. I hate those places so much. I am a very good cook myself and would never press a burger.

 Sweet Mels makes really good Burgers, so go there and try it for yourself. Go with friends and have a great night out. I will go back when I can and try something else.

Ok it was 9/11 when I went there. The bartender spoke up and said we are going to salute the victims of the horrible attack of our Nation, Everyone at the bar will get a shot of whiskey and when I ring the bell hold your shot up high and we will all toast to everyone that we lost. That was very touching to me. Thank you to that bartender! Let me mention that the burgers costs around $11.99

data.title: Awesome!
data.text: Brags to be the best burger in Gainesville and can back it up! Can't wait to go back! Awesome onion rings and "hell fries" too!  Can't wait to try other menu items!  A must when you're in Gainesville! Skip Square 1 Burgers and go for the best!

data.title: Melsmorizing
data.text: Very friendly and informative staff! I highly recommend the Caribbean jerk chicken wings that are crispy and deliciously prepared in a home made dry rub. They have a $5.00 beer pitcher special during happy hour. Don't forget to try their home made Yuenling beer battered deep fried mushroom appetizer, it's unbelievable!

data.title: Food was different but good
data.text: Went few days ago service was ok. Restaurant/bar was kinda old and dark. But now the food on the other hand was good. Had to try the sampler platter. 3 different apps. Had the hell fries they was amazing. The pot stickers with queso stuffed inside tasted great nice twist. Mac N chz bites was ok. We shared a big chz burger . Didn't realize what it was till it came out 2 grilled cheese sandwich as the bun with chz burger inside. With a side dish . Way to much food but and over cooked as I asked for med not well-done but it was still juicy and delicious. Would go again to try there other flavors of fries.

data.title: Great Irish Nachos
data.text: Stopped here for a late night snack and cocktails, the placed was clean, the crowd fun and service awesome. Only tried the Irish nachos and they were exceptional I will definitely come back and try other menu options at a later date

data.title: Decent burgers
data.text: If you're in the mood for a burger, but don't want a long wait at some of the other nearby places, drop in here for a decent burger & fries.

data.title: Good burgers
data.text: Classic college bar. Burgers and beer. They have a few off the wall recipes. Atmosphere is dark and musty. We were there for weekday lunch, place was almost empty. I would recommend for college night life or quick lunch.

data.title: Excellent burger or Salads
data.text: Eaten here a couple times before the Free Friday concerts at Bo Diddley Plaza.  Withing walking distance so you can set up your chairs and walk on over.  Great seasonal burger ideas and delicious salads in crispy shell bowls.  Little noisy if there are big groups, but great food.

data.title: Top notch burgers!!
data.text:
Sweet Mel's has an extensive burger selection.  There are other good burger joints in town, but this one sets itself apart.  You can get your burger cooked to order here, which is a pretty much a necessity.  They have a variety of combinations to choose from.  I had a breakfast burger made with a fried egg, bacon, hash browns, and cheese on top of a juicy beef patty and stuffed between two pieces of french toast.  Syrup and a special sauce were served with it.  There are many other combos or you can create your own.  

There's a special at the bar each day.  I ordered my usual Bloody Mary and it was superb!  The beer selection is not very extensive at all, but they have the popular ones....not many craft beers.  However, the service was really good and friendly.

Overall, they have great food, good drinks, and a nice atmosphere.  I'll be back.

data.title: Typical College Corner Bar
data.text: As a family we dropped in on a whim looking for a place to grab a beer and a quick bite to eat. Service was very slow and not friendly. The food took forever to arrive. By the time our food was served we were ready to leave. The pictures are blurry but as you can see the food is not plated to impress. It's a typical corner college bar and grill type spot.

data.title: Gainesville stay Part II
data.text: Sweet Mel's was definately one of the best burgers I have had! Service was great and a really comfortable, casual environment. Great spot in Gainesville. Would definately go  back. Great service and great food!

data.title: Burgers and more
data.text: Sweet Mel's is a great place for a casual date.  The burgers are excellent, the atmosphere is pleasant and the drinks are very good.

data.title: Best Burger in Gainesville
data.text: I had heard about Sweet Mel's burgers and brought the family there to try them early  on a Sunday afternoon.  Don't let the bar atmosphere steer you away.  Sweet Mel's did not disappoint on their burgers.  I had the burger with bacon, avocado and chesse and it was amazing.  So juicy and flavorful I can't wait to go back!

data.title: Just God awful
data.text: Almost no other patrons were there when we arrived. We were greeted with extremely slow service and they followed that with taking forever to get our meals to us. Four people in our party, each ordered a burger. They had four chances to get our orders right and failed miserably on each by overcooking them. I am starting to suspect that Gainesville restaurants save their very worst for when I visit. The only thing "sweet" about Mel's is their sweet smell of failure.

data.title: Nice place to hang
data.text: My family and I went for some burgers. Food was good, drinks were okay, service was okay too. Would recommend because burgers are a bit interesting but just know you will be waiting a bit and the drinks taste like no alcohol.

data.title: Best food and service
data.text: Going to a game. Check out this place. Best burgers ever. The owner is very friendly and the atmosphere is great. Stay away from the chain restaurants littered all over town.  Come here !! You won't be sad.

data.title: Fun menu
data.text:
If you are trying to be good and eat healthy, this may not be the place for you. However, they do now have a salad bar. Several of us went for lunch last week and we were pleasantly surprised. 
Started out with deep fried mac and cheese wedges............amazing. The prime rib was delish. They have lots of different burgers and plenty of sides to choose from. 
We shared the deep fried oreos.................they tasted so much better than they sounded. 
Looking forward to going back there soon.

data.title: Good Food and Experience
data.text: Had lunch here recently and had a pleasant experience. My wife and I both had burgers with steamed broccoli. I forget the name of mine but it was of the mexican variety with guacamole, tostitos type strips, and cheese. It was good, but a little greasy like some others mentioned in previous reviews. Not the worst I have ever seen but there was some dripping off of it. The broccoli was wonderful I will say and my wife really enjoyed her burger and it looked less greasy than mine. Service was very good, but it was not very busy. Overall a good experience and I would return again.

data.title: I'll just cut to the chase on this one -
data.text:
Pros - decent tasting burgers, onion rings hot and fresh (though they tasted sweet like they were cooked in the same oil as the sweet fried desserts they offer), service mostly attentive and matter-of-fact friendly (neither here nor there), beer selection ok, sweet tea decent

Cons - table was sticky, menus were stained, small flies were flying around the condiments, side order for one in my party was not correct, burger was undercooked vs. requested doneness that was asked at time of ordering, bartender / server seemed more interested in his phone and talking to the other workers in Spanish as we sat there, food seemed to take a long time to come out with us as the only table there

Really wanted to like it as based on the locals' recommendations and reviews - and we were looking forward to trying it.  Perhaps caught a bad bad day... ??  But, we won’t go back again.

data.title: Great place!!! Live music!!!
data.text:
Good Prices... Latin Nigth With VIbra Band : Awesome!!!!
Great location... Club and a restaurant!!! You can go with your family since the place have the two areas (restaurant and club) a part.
